body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install openfoam %intel +kahip+metis+mgridgen+paraview+vtk+zoltan ^freetype@2.7.1
```
### Platform and user environment
```console
$ uname -a 
Linux login06 3.10.0-957.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Nov 8 23:39:32 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```


- `packages.yaml`
```yaml
packages:
  all:
    compiler: [gcc, intel, pgi, clang, xl, nag, fj]
    providers:
      D: [ldc]
      awk: [gawk]
      blas: [openblas]
      daal: [intel-daal]
      elf: [elfutils]
      fftw-api: [fftw]
      gl: [mesa+opengl, opengl]
      glx: [mesa+glx, opengl]
      glu: [mesa-glu, openglu]
      golang: [gcc]
      ipp: [intel-ipp]
      java: [openjdk, jdk, ibm-java]
      jpeg: [libjpeg-turbo, libjpeg]
      lapack: [openblas]
      mariadb-client: [mariadb-c-client, mariadb]
      mkl: [intel-mkl]
      mpe: [mpe2]
      mpi: [openmpi, mpich]
      mysql-client: [mysql, mariadb-c-client]
      opencl: [pocl]
      pil: [py-pillow]
      pkgconfig: [pkgconf, pkg-config]
      scalapack: [netlib-scalapack]
      szip: [libszip, libaec]
      tbb: [intel-tbb]
      unwind: [libunwind]
    permissions:
      read: world
      write: user
    buildable: true
    version: []
    target: []
    paths: {}
    modules: {}
```
- `compilers.yaml`
```yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    operating_system: centos7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: gcc@4.8.5
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /opt/ohpc/pub/apps/intel/2019/compilers_and_libraries_2019.5.281/linux/bin/intel64/icc
      cxx: /opt/ohpc/pub/apps/intel/2019/compilers_and_libraries_2019.5.281/linux/bin/intel64/icpc
      f77: /opt/ohpc/pub/apps/intel/2019/compilers_and_libraries_2019.5.281/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
      fc: /opt/ohpc/pub/apps/intel/2019/compilers_and_libraries_2019.5.281/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
    operating_system: centos7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: intel@19.0.5.281
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /opt/ohpc/pub/compiler/gcc/8.3.0/bin/gcc
      cxx: /opt/ohpc/pub/compiler/gcc/8.3.0/bin/g++
      f77: /opt/ohpc/pub/compiler/gcc/8.3.0/bin/gfortran
      fc: /opt/ohpc/pub/compiler/gcc/8.3.0/bin/gfortran
    operating_system: centos7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: gcc@8.3.0
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /opt/ohpc/pub/apps/intel/2018_2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/icc
      cxx: /opt/ohpc/pub/apps/intel/2018_2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/icpc
      f77: /opt/ohpc/pub/apps/intel/2018_2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
      fc: /opt/ohpc/pub/apps/intel/2018_2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
    operating_system: centos7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: intel@18.0.5
```

### Additional information
title: Installation issue: Openfoam
